name: Golf Party
description:
Welcome to Golf Party! Mini Golf done right! As a traditional mini golf game we prided ourselves in making a mini golf game that was insanely fun to play with your friends, as well as playing with people you don't know! Currently all game modes can handle up to 20 players! We have Multiple maps, Multiple Game modes including Mini Golf and Racer, Unlockable items, and so much more coming!

Current Available Maps

Golf mode

Alien Planet
Castle
Golf Park
Golf Park "High Quality"
Golf Park "Night"
Dark Fantasy
Volcanic
Ghost Town

Racer Mode

Steller
Space War

Currently in development
Light Ball Game Mode

We hope you enjoy Golf Party as much as we do and hope to see you in game!
